column1: We are very saddened to hear that Bonnie Duvall wife of American Farm Bureau President Zippy Duvall has lost her battle with cancer. Please join Vivien and I in praying for the Duvall family during this difficult time.
Congratulations @realDonaldTrump on this huge win for American farmers and businesses!   China will purchase $200B of U.S. goods most of which will be agricultural products. https://t.co/xqJAtZZkQP

I voted NO on the resolution to strip @realDonaldTrump of a critically necessary power to defend against increasing aggression against us and our partners in the region. He had complete authority to utilize an airstrike against General Soleimani and he made the right call. (4/4)
President Obama averaged six kills a week by air strikes according to his own DNI (https://t.co/XoTZDTkjpd). (3/4)

The only reason Iran is singled out in this resolution is to take a political jab at President Trump for utilizing an airstrike to take out General Soleimani – a terrorist who was responsible for killing thousands of American and partner troops. (2/4)

If we want to have an honest debate about war powers then we should have an honest debate about war powers. Why then did our colleagues on the other side of the aisle single out only Iran in this resolution? Why not Libya? Why not Syria? (1/4)

Today is Law Enforcement Appreciation Day a time to recognize and thank the men and women who bravely protect and serve our communities. To all our Middle and South Georgia law enforcement officers: Thank you for the important work you do each and every day. #GA08 https://t.co/e5lT3Cp7ZO

Just spoke w/ @WGXAnews on Soleimani’s death & last night’s attack. Soleimani was the leader of a designated terrorist org. @realDonaldTrump made the right call. If President Obama would have made the same call @SpeakerPelosi & @HouseDemocrats would be praising him for it. https://t.co/mZMR4sETxu
At 11:00 am President Trump will address the nation. You can watch LIVE here: https://t.co/FYTJPMpsUR

Please keep our American and partner forces serving overseas and their families in your prayers tonight. It is 3:50 am in Iraq and Iran has struck bases that house U.S. and partner forces with missiles.

I'd like to welcome the newest member of the Georgia Congressional Delegation Sen. Kelly Loeffler. I look forward to working with @SenatorLoeffler on issues important to Georgians including our national defense the economy our ag sector and supporting President Trump. https://t.co/n3YZhwL6i5
With his death we must be prepared for any retaliatory actions and continue to work with partners to ensure stability in the region and any areas where Iran’s proxies are currently operating. (2/2)

For years Iran has used proxies to attack and kill American soldiers and our partner forces. Qassem Soleimani was the head of the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps- Quds Force a designated terrorist organization and was responsible for these attacks. (1/2)

Today in 1788 GA became the 4th state admitted to the Union. For over 230 yrs GA has played a key role in our nation’s economy defense culture & identity & has produced musicians presidents astronauts & Olympians. I'm proud to be from GA & proud to serve Georgians in DC. https://t.co/OoV1ITB4Xn

Vivien the kids and I wish you and your family a very #MerryChristmas and blessed holiday season. We remember those serving abroad today and say a special thank you to our troops and military families. God Bless. https://t.co/iWZqBf2kkf

Moments ago the House passed #USMCA. I congratulate & thank @realDonaldTrump on securing this important trade deal which passed with my support. This new agreement with GA’s top export markets is critical to ensuring the success of our businesses farmers & manufacturers. https://t.co/NxUcEY1FjS

House Democrats have used sequencing & patterns to manufacture a sham case for impeachment of @realDonaldTrump. Their hatred for the President of the United States blinds them to the truth. I’ll be voting NO on articles of impeachment. #ImpeachmentSham https://t.co/jRTBj87jjK

Wonderful night at the White House tonight with the President and First Lady. I extended to them Christmas wishes from the Eighth District and thanked @realDonaldTrump for his tireless work to keep America the greatest country in the world. https://t.co/bOeQfrRCyJ
This afternoon #HouseAg will hold a hearing on farm credit programs. You can tune in here at 2:00 pm ET: https://t.co/8StoPd0yHN https://t.co/3e7gIfV96Q
Very special visitor in town this week. We had the chance to see the Christmas decorations at the White House. https://t.co/za7tsFIQ1q

Yesterday @RepAdamSchiff's Counsel admitted to @RepDougCollins to using sequencing & patterns to build a circumstantial case.   The facts are not on their side but still they move forward w/ their partisan baseless #ShamImpeachment. Their hatred of @realDonaldTrump has no end. https://t.co/8N83TZnd06

Today we remember the 2403 Americans who lost their lives defending our country in the attack on Pearl Harbor. Their sacrifices will never be forgotten. #HonorThem #PearlHarborRemembranceDay #PearlHarbor78 https://t.co/kVkM6FSjFn

It’s been an honor to serve our fellow Georgians alongside you Tom. Vivien and I wish you Julie and your family all the best in your next chapter. Thank you for your decades of service to our great state both in the GA House and in Congress. https://t.co/iSwgzZrTBQ

Profs without proof. Not a single one of yesterday’s legal professors had any personal knowledge of a single fact in Adam Schiff’s report. This has been a factless personal attack against President Trump from the start. #ShamImpeachment https://t.co/eg2gDksXnG

This new rule will provide a pathway off the program for many able-bodied adults without dependents while giving them tools to climb the economic ladder. I thank @POTUS & @SecretarySonny for their commitment to creating opportunities for every American. https://t.co/UfJFMAl4I3

I’d like to congratulate Kelly Loeffler on her appointment to the U.S. Senate. I look forward to working with her as a member of the Georgia Delegation to support our military installations #GA farmers and rural communities and especially President Trump.

Powerful words today from my friend and colleague @SenatorIsakson. His character and statesmanship will be greatly missed in Washington. Vivien and I wish him and Dianne the best as they enter into their next chapter together. You’re the best Johnny. https://t.co/uJRc1eBkO1

Please join me in thanking our warfighters first responders & their families for their service & sacrifices. Our thoughts are with them & those who are unable to spend the holidays with their loved ones. From our family to yours we wish everyone a happy & safe #Thanksgiving. https://t.co/KUODlmWB4J

Vivien & I are saddened to hear of the passing of State Rep. & former Mayor of Camilla Jay Powell. Jay was a good friend & fierce fighter for GA & his impact to our state & rural communities cannot be understated. Our prayers are with his family during this difficult time. https://t.co/ERK89dnADr

I'd like to thank my colleagues who joined me on the House Floor this afternoon to pay tribute to the legislative legacy of @SenatorIsakson. Johnny is a giant among men & it has been an honor to work alongside him fighting for the good people of GA. https://t.co/VapY4MEaLV

Guilty until proven innocent. That my friends is the way they do it in China Venezuela Cuba and against @realDonaldTrump in the U.S. House of Representatives under @SpeakerPelosi. https://t.co/AELKYVf6tL

This call is the basis of Speaker Pelosi & Adam Schiff’s impeachment inquiry & Ambassador Yovanovitch was recalled a month & a half before it even took place. The facts don’t matter to our Dem colleagues. They’ve been trying to impeach @realDonaldTrump since he was sworn in. https://t.co/1MYcHngDcs

Wishing @FarmBureau a very happy 100th birthday. I thank them and President @ZippyDuvall (a fellow Georgian) for their commitment to our nation's farmers and our ag industry. I look forward to seeing the positive impact of their work for many years to come. https://t.co/9a9N1je5ly

If you're a #GA08 veteran experiencing issues with the VA or any other federal agency my office may be able to help. Please do not hesitate to give us a call: Tifton: 229-396-5175 Warner Robins: 478-971-1776 Washington D.C.: 202-225-6531

On this #VeteransDay let us come together to honor our nation's veterans and their families thank them for their service and sacrifices and remember those who lost their lives for our great nation. #HonorThem https://t.co/wMXLmGNnhW

This morning I sent a letter to @SpeakerPelosi calling on her to release ALL transcripts of the depositions related to the impeachment inquiry. House Members need to be given the opportunity to review unredacted copies of the depositions in accordance with House Rules. https://t.co/cfs27ittUl
I just voted against @SpeakerPelosi’s resolution to continue her sham impeachment inquiry against @realDonaldTrump. Their hatred for him is not grounds for impeachment.
At 9:30 AM #HouseAg will meet to discuss reauthorization of the @CFTC. You can watch live here: https://t.co/lRBYuveKM8 https://t.co/affv35OPRA

The death of Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi should serve as a reminder to those who seek to promote extremism that the US remains committed to rooting out terrorism. I thank @realDonaldTrump for his leadership & our brave warfighters who continue this dangerous mission each & every day.

Today 34 of my colleagues joined me in sending a letter to @USTradeRep encouraging the Administration to prioritize reducing India’s tariffs on American pecans as trade negotiations continue. You can read the full letter here: https://t.co/BkyFNcSGJ4 https://t.co/jK2QWm0B70

This Saturday (10/26) is National Prescription Drug Take Back Day sponsored by the Drug Enforcement Administration. DEA’s Take Back Day provides an opportunity to safely & securely dispose of unused or expired medications. You can find more info here: https://t.co/z8gQoslp8w

House Democrats and the Chairman of the House Intelligence Committee seem to think that impeachment is nothing but a game of if you can’t beat him cheat him. #StopTheSchiffShow https://t.co/MpYI9muSDj

To say @RepAdamSchiff lied to the American people is an understatement. He deserves to be censured and yesterday I joined 184 of my colleagues to do so. Unfortunately @HouseDemocrats protected this scam artist by voting to table the resolution. (2/2)

Adam Schiff fabricated a call transcript between @POTUS & Ukrainian President Zelensky and read it aloud and on-the-record during a @HouseIntel hearing. All the while he has used his power as Chairman of this Committee to keep the actual transcript in a vault. (1/2)
Vivien and I send our condolences and prayers to Rep. Cummings’ wife Maya and their family friends staff and constituents during this time.

Rep. Elijah Cummings was a devoted father husband and public servant who represented Maryland's 7th Congressional District for over 20 years. Rep. Cummings was tough but fair and a gentle giant. He will be sorely missed by his family and in the halls of Congress.

My district offices are accepting appointment requests to answer questions & speak with #GA08 constituents to discuss their Medicare Part D options. Medicare Part D open enrollment runs through Dec. 7 & this is the only time to make changes to your plan. https://t.co/ZnUtBb9uZf

Big news for #GA08: @CocaColaUnited to invest $60M to build a new facility in Tifton. It'll serve South GA & the FL panhandle distributing 4.5M @CocaCola products a yr & creating 200 jobs. I look forward to seeing the positive impacts of this investment. https://t.co/OzHH67G8Pk

Congratulations to Bill Brim and Foster Rhodes for being inducted into the Georgia Agricultural Hall of Fame this year. These men are strong advocates for Georgia’s farmers and rural communities and this honor is well deserved. https://t.co/t27mic1DsH https://t.co/70qMWvSqFf

Adam Schiff knew about the whistleblower complaint before it was filed. In fact his staff secretly advised the whistleblower on how to proceed. While waging false collusion accusations against @POTUS they themselves colluded to orchestrate his takedown. https://t.co/R0ypku58M7

.@GovKemp thank you for your continued commitment to our GA bases and our men and women in uniform.They play an integral role in both our communities and our national defense. 🇺🇸 #GA08 https://t.co/2OmJ9ZH51i

I appreciate @gacities inviting me to speak at their Rural Broadband Summit this week. Broadband is much more than streaming video & sending emails it’s crucial for everything from education to health care & I’m fighting for more investment to bridge the digital divide. #GA08 https://t.co/YPbRpmJ2oT

Thank you to the @GAChamber for having me speak yesterday on the importance of our GA military installations. GA’s 9 installations spur economic activity and skilled workforce development in rural communities across our great state. #GA08 https://t.co/9sKicfDgOW

For 25 yrs Mac Thornberry has faithfully served Texans. As Chairman & now RM of HASC he has fought to ensure our military remains the most elite fighting force in the world. Mac's leadership will be missed both on the Committee & in Congress. We wish him & his family the best. https://t.co/8qRmtfC336

Last night I voted to bring forward the whistleblower complaint. There's no new info from what we already received. Bottom line: There was no quid pro quo. Democrats are so consumed with undoing the 2016 election that they continue to grasp at straws for crimes that don't exist.

Yesterday @POTUS & PM @AbeShinzo signed a trade agreement that will increase & improve market access for ag products such as pork beef & wheat. I look forward to continued negotiations w/ Japan & other int'l partners to further expand market access for American producers. https://t.co/Oa0oPD6IgA

Unfortunately Speaker Pelosi has succumbed to the belligerent left & their media allies to move forward w/ an impeachment inquiry against @POTUS. Dems continue to waste time & taxpayer dollars on endless investigations while refusing to address the challenges our nation faces.
#GA08 sure is proud of our Warner Robins native @GeorgiaFootball QB Jake Fromm. Looking forward to a great game today. #ATD #GoDawgs https://t.co/CU55T8hzsE

Yesterday #HouseAg held a hearing on federal farm & disaster programs. During the hearing I had the chance to raise the issue of continued delays in assistance for GA farmers impacted by Hurricane Michael & my fight for additional resources. Watch here: https://t.co/6MuO8GC2Rm

Please join me in wishing the @usairforce a happy 72nd birthday. To our Airmen at @RobinsAFB_GA #MoodyAFB and all U.S. Airmen here at home and around the world thank you for your dedication and service to our great nation. #AIRPOWER #THISIS72 #HBDUSAF #GA08 https://t.co/XP7ShXEpLS

I’d like to thank everyone who attended our #GA08 Military Service Academy Day at the @MOAatRAFB. Students who were unable to attend can contact my Tifton office at 229-396-5175 or visit my website (https://t.co/mAw1ZDpDQT) for more info on the application process. https://t.co/EHqOsIvutc

Good seeing my friend @VP Mike Pence this morning at the @HouseGOP Member Conference. I’m thankful for his steadfast dedication to keeping our county safe and expanding opportunities for all Americans. May God continue to bless him and his family. https://t.co/RqdUdZLwI7
Fellow @GeorgiaFootball fans: Be sure to #WearPinkForWendy this weekend and #GoDawgs! 🏈🔴⚫️ https://t.co/supw431aJH
We can protect our natural resources without infringing on the rights of millions of Americans. I thank @POTUS for this rollback. #WOTUS https://t.co/2ga9JAZcjW

18 years ago our nation stood still as news came in of attacks on American soil. We will #NeverForget the more than 3000 Americans who lost their lives that day in NYC DC & PA. Today we honor their lives the first responders on scene & our troops overseas. #NeverAgain https://t.co/wYCsK6TRLH

I recently returned from a visit to Germany Nigeria Niger Mali & France where I met with servicemembers assigned to @USAfricaCommand. As a @HASCRepublicans member I sought to better understand counterterrorism efforts & the growing Russian & Chinese influence across Africa. https://t.co/2Vz5Nk0jcI
If you do not receive my weekly email updates you can sign up here: https://t.co/rDFQagbD8C

I wanted to share my weekly newsletter that contains important info regarding #HurricaneDorian including prep tips info on price gouging in GA & temporary closures of some VA medical facilities due to the expected weather. #GA08 https://t.co/Q5VlSAzfdO

As #HurricaneDorian continues to approach the Southeast I'd encourage constituents in #GA08 to heed any weather watches & warnings & plan ahead for any potential severe weather. You can download the @fema app or follow @GeorgiaEMA for the latest updates on Dorian's impact to GA.

Johnny Isakson is a giant among men & it has been an honor to work alongside him fighting for the good people of GA. For decades Johnny has faithfully served our state & his character godliness & statesmanship will be greatly missed in Washington. https://t.co/1iek3AJZ8o

Community health centers play a key role in bridging a gap in services for countless Georgians. I met with staff of First Choice Primary Care in Macon this week to discuss funding programs & ways we can increase access for those in our communities with limited access to care. https://t.co/uFi4HBBtmp

The @usairforce has finished installing new wings on the last of 173 A-10’s including many at Moody AFB. The fight for re-winging was a bipartisan multi-delegation effort & will keep this critical close-air support capability flying well into the 2030’s. https://t.co/lFvnW7F9q9

The state of GA’s economy & growth is strong thanks to @GAChamber & countless local state & federal leaders. I’d like to thank @SecElaineChao for joining us today at #GACL19 to celebrate GA businesses & the community groups & leaders that make GA the #1 state for business. https://t.co/bynAG5xXD0

I was honored to meet with Junior Reserve Officers' Training Corps (JROTC) students at Irwin County High School today. I was very impressed by the maturity of this group & I wish them the best in their future endeavors. #GA08 https://t.co/z2T0yzAXTK

This morning @sendavidperdue & I joined local leaders and South Central Primary Care Center in Ocilla to celebrate National Health Center Week. Our community health care centers are pivotal to the health & wellbeing of Georgians in rural communities throughout our state. #GA08 https://t.co/LR1m3r2Tnk

Great being w/ the American Peanut Shellers Association at their pre-harvest meeting. I highlighted the shift we’re seeing in Congress where fewer & fewer Members support ag. I’m committed to our farmers & to stressing to my colleagues the importance of ag & rural communities. https://t.co/KpDDjqzw4b

Today on #NationalPurpleHeartDay we honor the men and women in uniform who have given their lives or who were wounded in the line of duty protecting our nation and our freedoms. God bless our Purple Heart veterans. #HonorThem https://t.co/khu9dnhCwc

Our hearts are with the victims in El Paso as well as their friends family and community during this time. Also we are thankful for the acts of bravery shown by law enforcement and first responders on the scene.

As we all know being prepared for hurricanes & severe weather is the greatest deterrent to damage to our homes businesses & families. I urge you to plan ahead for your family’s safety & encourage your friends & neighbors to do the same. #GA08 #preparetogether #hurricaneprep https://t.co/rSkzwirYOh
Thank you @ChairmanHeath for sponsoring the @CFTC's Agricultural Advisory Committee which serves as a vital link between the CFTC & our ag community. https://t.co/u5Fyu0nP3x

This week @repdavidscott and I sent a letter to @ESMAComms Chairman Steven Maijoor urging close coordination with the @CFTC when implementing EMIR 2.2 and other regulations or laws that would affect derivatives markets. You can read our letter below: https://t.co/iApOxafUpr

The @usairforce is teaming up with wifi providers to integrate #5G on 10 bases including @RobinsAFB_GA Moody AFB and @DobbinsARB. This is big news for GA & has the potential to spur greater high-speed network investment in our rural communities. #GA08 https://t.co/SJIO22kFih

As Chairman & now RM of the House Ag Committee @ConawayTX11 has done tremendous work for our ag industry. While he'll be missed I look forward to continuing to work w/ him & our #HouseAg colleagues this Congress to address the challenges our producers & rural communities face.

Since 2015 a program at Moody AFB training Afghan Air Force pilots has played a key role in the int'l effort to combat extremists in Afghanistan (the former Al-Qaeda base of operations). We thank our Moody Airmen for their important work on this mission. https://t.co/pNq3pxAlML
You can find more information on the comment period and how to submit a comment to @FMCSA here: https://t.co/Ow4GzVVwQp. (4/4)

This week @FMCSA announced a public comment period on this very issue. It is vital we update these definitions to bring relief to our agricultural truckers & ensure our agricultural commodities are treated fairly under trucking laws. (3/4)

H.R. 1673 would provide clarity for the def of “agricultural commodity” as it relates to transportation policy & compliance w/ Electronic Logging Device & Hours of Service rules & regulations. @sendavidperdue has introduced similar bipartisan legislation in the Senate. (2/4)

Transportation carriers are vital to the movement of goods & services & our farmers depend on them to carry their goods to markets & consumers. That’s why I introduced w/ bipartisan support the Agricultural Trucking Relief Act (H.R. 1673). (1/4)

We have kicked off #GA08's 2019 Congressional App Challenge which engages middle & high school students in STEM fields to create and exhibit an app for web PC tablet or mobile. You can find more information on the competition here: https://t.co/zAOnxqHLux

Will Matney of Moultrie recently completed an internship in our DC office. We thank him for his hard work & attentiveness to the people of #GA08.   We are currently seeking interns for the fall semester. You can find more info on our internships here: https://t.co/O99OEy0la1 https://t.co/X919LOXbHP
Praying for my good friend @SenatorIsakson. I know he'll be back at it soon. https://t.co/UTa0Pcr8Oj
Uncivil discourse diminishes our ability to pass meaningful legislation that works to solve the challenges our country faces. (2/2)

I voted NO on H.Res. 489 because plainly I don’t believe @POTUS is a racist. I share the frustrations of the majority of Americans & my colleagues about the continued derogatory statements towards our country & unprofessional language & rhetoric coming from both sides. (1/2)
My full statement on the #FY20NDAA here: https://t.co/aKgVdodxSW

Historically the #NDAA has unified Dems & Republicans & shown the world how America values the security of our nation our warfighters & their families & the important job they do protecting us in a dangerous world. This year House Dems decided to end the bipartisan tradition.

You can watch my full opening remarks from today's House Ag Subcommittee on Commodity Exchanges Energy & Credit hearing on the importance of affordable reliable high-speed broadband internet at the link below. (3/3) https://t.co/7u7VmaRFAY

The Ag Committee did great work in the 2018 Farm Bill to ensure that @USDA has the tools it needs to bridge rural America's digital divide. I'm committed to finding rural broadband solutions & I'll continue to oversee the rural broadband improvements in the Farm Bill. (2/3)

More than 24M Americans in rural communities don't have broadband access & lack the infrastructure for a reliable affordable connection. From improving edu opportunities to accessing health care to innovative farming tech broadband access is key in rural communities. (1/3)

Great meeting w/ @valdostastate President Carvajal yesterday to discuss the great things happening on campus & VSU's work in the region through the Center for South GA Regional Impact. We also celebrated @valdostastatefb's 4th @NCAADII National Championship. #BlazerNation #GA08 https://t.co/tJi1r47Wym

I hope everyone has had a very happy & safe Independence Day. As we know all too well freedom is not free. I hope you will join me in celebrating the victory valor & sacrifices of our Armed Forces past & present & the families that support them. https://t.co/NPlB58KWL8

Earlier this week #HouseAg held a hearing on #Brexit & other int'l developments affecting US derivatives markets. During the hearing I stressed the need for @CFTC & European counterpart to work together to preserve our open global markets. Watch here: https://t.co/DnXfTpqjk3 https://t.co/Ftuqdv0Aht

I am committed to immigration reform & I will continue working towards policies that protect the homeland while welcoming immigrants that seek to come to this country through lawful channels to live work or study. (4/4)
...all while working to fix our immigration system & close loopholes that encourage migrants to make the dangerous journey to cross our border illegally. (3/4)

While I'm glad to see this measure pass today we must continue to ensure law enforcement at the border & immigration officials have the tools needed to secure the border process immigration cases and asylum requests & meet humanitarian needs.... (2/4)

The House just passed emergency funds for humanitarian assistance & security at the southern border. It includes funding for 30 new immigration judge teams resources to counter human trafficking & funds for essential items and services among other things. (1/4)

Today House Democrats rejected a motion to fund the hiring of additional immigration judges to help process the 900000 immigration and asylum case backlog. We have a crisis at our border and a broken immigration system but they refuse to work with us to fix anything. #GA08

Each summer @Georgia_EMC brings students from across the state to DC to meet w/ members of Congress & to see how our government works up close. It was great to speak w/ them this morning & meet w/ a group from #GA08. These young folks are very bright & the future of our state. https://t.co/ToGotBSXez

Good to be with @GovKemp @SecretarySonny Georgia Ag Commissioner Gary Black @sendavidperdue and @SanfordBishop today to speak with farmers and community leaders on forthcoming disaster assistance which President Trump signed into law yesterday. #GA08 https://t.co/kuj1VYLsuS

President Trump just signed into law disaster relief to help our farmers and rural communities devastated by Hurricane Michael. Thank you @POTUS for your commitment to rural America. #GA08 https://t.co/6pGNV2R8SZ

Disaster assistance for our farmers & rural communities is headed to @POTUS to be signed into law. It can’t be stressed enough that the process to get this passed was too political too lengthy. However rural Americans are resilient & we’ll recover from this storm together. https://t.co/qo2g2YWUZ7

While I remain frustrated that it has taken eight months to get this relief today Georgians can rest a little easier knowing that this package has passed through Congress and is on its way to President Trump’s desk to be signed into law. (2/2) #GA08 https://t.co/3RERllohI5

In October Hurricane Michael ripped through GA. For months @SanfordBishop & I have worked in a bipartisan fashion w/ our colleagues in Congress & state officials to ensure our farmers & rural communities get the help they need to put the pieces back together again. (1/2)

For the 3rd time in a week self-serving Members have blocked much-needed disaster assistance for communities impacted by natural disasters. They seek no changes to the package only to make a name for themselves. The facts remain the same: This will pass the 1st week of June.

Unfortunately more clowns showed up today to once again delay disaster relief for the states and farmers devastated by the storms of 2018. This bill will pass the House next week and President Trump will sign it. #GA08

I wanted to take a moment and wish everyone a happy and safe Memorial Day. While we are enjoying time with friends and family let us not forget the real reason for Memorial Day and honor those who have made the ultimate sacrifice for our freedoms. https://t.co/OAhTBRw1ZL

While political games over disaster assistance continue as a Member from TX blocked a package from getting to @POTUS desk today one thing is clear: This bill has broad support & will advance when the House reconvenes & will be signed into law by POTUS the first week of June.

This package is much-needed relief & contains language that I've fought for which will help farmers ranchers & our pecan timber & seasonal fruit & vegetable producers. I urge House leadership to swiftly pass it & send it to the President’s desk. #GA08 https://t.co/H39udjv0SQ

Our military families are a key component of our national defense & I'm very pleased to see @usairforce will now reimburse up to $500 when spouses must obtain state occupational relicensures/recertifications during a permanent change of station or assignment across state lines. https://t.co/Gtne8KVcXn

I also introduced the ABLE Accounts for Veterans Act of 2019 (H.R.2656) alongside @RepGaramendi @RepHartzler & @RepRickCrawford. This bill would open up ABLE accounts to service-connected disabled vets providing more flexible care and treatment options. https://t.co/7w5McOlOLM

Last week @RepGaramendi @RepJimmyPanetta @RepHartzler & @RepRickCrawford joined me in introducing the Purple Heart Freedom to Work Act (H.R.2655) which would ensure veterans can actively engage in the workforce w/out fear of losing disability benefits. https://t.co/7w5McOlOLM

Last week Rumi Lee of Houston County High School was honored at the Congressional App Challenge #HouseofCode reception in DC. Rumi was our #GA08 winner for this year for her first aid medical assistance app which educates K-12 students on proper medical interventions. https://t.co/FW4yk7we1M
Happy Mother's Day to my mom my wonderful wife Vivien and all mothers in Georgia's Eighth District. I hope you have a wonderful day surrounded by family and loved ones. https://t.co/czgzJQhJgF

Our military families are much more than the "forces behind our forces" they are a key component of our national defense. Today on National Military Spouse Appreciation Day we extend a special "thank you" to our military spouses for the sacrifices they make for our country. https://t.co/meNTyvdxKl

This week I joined over 100 of my colleagues in sending a letter to @SpeakerPelosi & @GOPLeader pledging to protect the Hyde Amendment & oppose any attempts to undermine current #ProLife protections. https://t.co/PB3wbVwU4N

Thank you to Bart Davis #GA08 resident and Chairman of the @GACottonComm and our other witnesses for your informed testimony this morning before #HouseAg members. Good conversation on the challenges and opportunities in rural America. https://t.co/mbexZOBTud

May is Military Appreciation Month but “Every Day in Middle GA is Armed Forces Appreciation Day.” Please join me in thanking our active duty warfighters veterans and military families for their sacrifices and service to our great nation. #EDIMGIAFAD #GA08 https://t.co/qdi7UJsX1j

.@secnav76 has announced that a new @USNavy destroyer will be named in honor of former GA Senator and Chairman of the Senate Armed Services Committee Sam Nunn. Sam has dedicated his life to service to country and this honored is well bestowed. https://t.co/tm6UlFv13g

They say they want to fix our broken healthcare system. If that’s the case I call on my colleagues across the aisle to work with us to do so. You can watch my full remarks below: https://t.co/gechi2JTPh

Another issue (1 of many) I have with the Dems’ support of the ACA is the lie they spread that you can sign-up for insurance whenever you have the need. That is blatantly false. Individuals can only sign-up during open enrollment which only runs for a couple of weeks each yr.

One big change I've advocated for is to bring health insurers under the umbrella of US anti-trust laws. How can we expect lower premiums if these companies are exempt from anti-trust laws (which are in place for good reason & cover virtually every other industry in our country)?

I got a little heated this week when my Democratic colleagues suggested that the Affordable Care Act (ACA) is good as-is and doesn't need any major changes to better help the American people. That couldn't be further from the truth and they know it.
